entry.title: More Countries Find Omicron Variant as Officials Grapple With Response
entry.content: Countries around the world reported their first cases as some imposed new travel restrictions, racing to protect themselves against the fast-spreading strain ahead of a potentially severe winter wave.

entry.title: How Omicron Variant Rattled the World in One Week
entry.content: The speedy discovery, announcement and global response shows a new phase in fight against Covid-19, as health officials hunt for variants that could evade vaccines.

entry.title: Taliban Covert Operatives Seized Kabul, Other Afghan Cities From Within
entry.content: Undercover agents—often clean-shaven, dressed in jeans and sporting sunglasses—spent years infiltrating Afghan government ministries, universities, businesses and aid organizations.
